metadata.title: CVE-2015-5251 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
OpenStack Image Service (Glance) before 2014.2.4 (juno) and 2015.1.x before2015.1.2 (kilo) allow remote authenticated users to change the status oftheir images and bypass access restrictions via the HTTPx-image-meta-status header to images/*.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glance - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.1
glance-api - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.1
glance-common - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.1
glance-registry - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.1
python-glance - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glance package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.1').
